name: VXXL
description: VXXL is fastest up-to-date POW coin (raising block each 7 seconds) implementing hybrid mechanics to prevent 51% attack of any scale. The coin will perform a classic ICO on June 29 on XT.com. The project team is deploying wrap gateways to ETH and BNB just days after listing on XT, so wrapped VXXL will become available for farming and AMM across all major DEXs. VXXL on its website announced lending and stablecoins protocols to be launching later this year and revolutionize Defi sector. VXXL utilizes unique PoW+PoS hybrid protocol & Scrypt cryptographic algo
